entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: A high-performance broomstick model that is highly sought after. It is mentioned as a Firebolt, on the run, and being looked for by the whole country.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who has bought a Firebolt broomstick. He is mentioned as discussing with McGonagall about stripping it down.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who wants to strip the Firebolt broomstick down. She is mentioned as being persuaded by Wood to see reason.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who promises to talk to McGonagall and make her see reason about the Firebolt broomstick.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts that is mentioned as wanting to win. McGonagall wants Gryﬀindor to win as much as the other students do.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts who has provided a bonfire with salamanders for the students' enjoyment. He is mentioned as providing dry wood and leaves to keep the fire blazing.

entities.name: salamanders
entities.description: A type of lizard that loves flames and are being kept in a bonfire by Hagrid. They are mentioned as scampering up and down the logs.

relationships.description: Wood promises to talk to McGonagall about the Firebolt broomstick and make her see reason.
McGonagall wants Gryﬀindor to win as much as the other students do.
Hagrid has provided a bonfire with salamanders for the students' enjoyment.
